name: Spaghetti with Pancetta and Peppers
description: Try this fool-proof Italian favourite at home tonight!
preparation: Cook spaghetti according to package directions in Multipurpose Pot .
Heat a frying pan to medium heat. Fry pancetta until just crisp. Remove from pan and drain on paper towel. Drain excess fat from pan, leaving about 2 tsp.

Saut√© red and green bell pepper for 4 minutes. Add Minced Garlic and Marinara Sauce Mix and cook until peppers are tender-crisp. Pour in Vegetable Broth and add cooked spaghetti and pancetta. Toss together and cook until pasta is evenly heated and stock is absorbed.
tips: Try making it with turkey or chicken bacon and 1 tsp olive oil.
